rdf:Description.lla:note: Ship owner: J. Griffith, Aberystwith. Voyage from Galway to Garston, Exmouth, Teignmouth, Liverpool, Trevine and Carnarvon.
Date of commencing voyage probably meant to be 1888.
Date of commencing voyage probably meant to be 1888.
No ship registered as Cancet. A ship was registered as Cancer at Grimsby 1883. Date of commencing voyage probably meant to be 1888.
Ship name could possibly be Cyril, registered in Liverpool 1890.
Ship owner: Mrs Jones, 13 George St, Aberstwyth. Voyage from Carnarvon to Hamburg, Dublin, Carnarvon, Hamburg and Liverpool.
Place of birth unclear, could refer to Manchester or possibly Amlwch.
A ship called Ann Davies was registered at Aberystwyth 1880. Place of birth could possibly be Acrefair, Wrexham.
Place of birth probably refers to Prestatyn.
A ship called Lakefield was registered at Liverpool 1880
Capacity may be Sailor. Last two digits of year of birth illegible, may be in the 1870s as this is David Thomas's first ship.
No Shialn Hill or similar found in registered ships for 1880 - 1890.
